channel.title: Blog on Dani Issac
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Dani Issac

item.title: Welcome to FirstHop
item.description: Welcome to FirstHop! A new networking blog focused on making complex concepts simple and accessible for everyone.

item.title: Understanding the OSI Model
item.description: The OSI model is fundamental to networking. Learn how data flows through the seven layers and why each layer matters.

item.title: Subnetting Made Simple
item.description: Master IP subnetting with practical examples and easy-to-follow methods. No more subnet calculator dependency!

item.title: TCP vs UDP: When to Use Each Protocol
item.description: Understanding the differences between TCP and UDP protocols and when to use each one in real-world applications.
